definition: to pollute (often fig.)/to be infected by/to gain a small advantage
to moisten/to be infected by/to receive benefit or advantage through a contact/to touch
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

pinyin: fang4 she4 xing4 zhan1 ran3 wu4

definition: to be corrupted by the ways of the world (idiom)

pinyin: zhan1 ran3 cheng2 du4 jian3 cha2 yi2

sentences.english: He was addicted to all sorts of vice.
This is the law of him that hath the issue of seed, and that is defiled by copulation.
sentences.chinese: 这是有关因淋病，或遗精沾染不洁的人。

sentences.english: He has picked up some bad habits at that club.
sentences.chinese: 他在那个俱乐部沾染上了一些坏习气。

sentences.english: The state or quality of being immaterial.
sentences.chinese: 沾染上有毒物质的状态。

sentences.english: These are habits which soon fasten themselves on people.
sentences.chinese: 这些习惯都是人们极易沾染上的。

sentences.english: I fall with infected with earthly powder, left bustling and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 我飘落在沾染尘世的粉末中，遗留了繁华与孤独。

sentences.english: The blighter must've worn it so long that some of it Evil rubbed off.
sentences.chinese: 那混蛋一定戴了许久，让它沾染了他的邪恶。

sentences.english: A zoologist attempts to capture a northern gannet affected by the oil spill.
sentences.chinese: 一个动物学家企图捕捉沾染漏油的北方塘鹅。

sentences.english: Fingertip around the year, with warm spring Qiusu time.
sentences.chinese: 指尖绕过的流年，沾染春温秋素的时光。

sentences.english: The soil should cover just the roots and not the crile crown on top of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 泥土应当恰好覆盖住根部，不要沾染植株的顶部。

sentences.english: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
sentences.chinese: 音乐可洗去灵魂中日常生活所沾染的污垢。

sentences.english: Naaman's leprosy will cling to you and to your descendants forever.'
sentences.chinese: 因此，乃缦的大麻疯必沾染你和你的后裔，直到永远。

sentences.english: She has already partaken of the pervading spirit of neglect which encompassed her.
sentences.chinese: 她已经沾染上了包围着她的那种到处蔓延的懒散精神。

sentences.english: The wound was infected with germs.
It can pre-cleaning most of pigment on the belt by water or scarper.
sentences.chinese: 刮预洗清除皮带上沾染之大部分色浆。
